name: Getting Players Onchain
description: Attracting players is often a challenge for onchain game developers. In this presentation, we'll share the strategies and insights gained from successfully engaging players for our onchain game, Primodium.

speakers.name: Morris Hsieh
speakers.bio: Morris Hsieh is co-founder of onchain factory sim Primodium. Previously, he worked on the onchain game Critterz and the AI startup Palifer.
